2. City Council

City Council
============

|  |
| --- |
| [**City Council Voting Results**](https://cv.garlandtx.gov/) |

The Garland City Council typically meets twice a month with Regular Meetings held on Tuesdays in the Council Chambers, beginning at 7 p.m. Work Sessions are also held the Mondays preceding each Regular Meeting in the Work Session Room, beginning at 6 p.m. All meetings are held at 200 N. Fifth St., Garland, TX 75040.

The Council Chambers at Garland City Hall is wheelchair accessible, and ADA parking is available on State Street as well as in the public parking garage behind City Hall. Persons who may need assistive listening devices or interpretation/translation services are asked to contact the City Secretary's Office at 972-205-2404 as soon as possible prior to the meeting so that we may do all we can to provide appropriate arrangements.

Garland City Council meetings are
livestreamed and available on-demand
, as well as broadcast on Spectrum Channel 16, Frontier Channel 44 and AT&T Uverse Channel 99. Closed captioning is available for each in English and Spanish.
Agendas
are also available prior to the meetings, with minutes posted following approval.

The City Council has organized committees to focus on specific issues. Committee meetings are scheduled as needed and are open to the public.
View a list of committees and meeting agendas.
